metatags.title: Football Map of World
metatags.description: Join football events in your area.

pitchOrIndoor: Pitch or Indoor Hall for Rent
name: Name

eventConfirmation.title: Thank you for adding your event!
eventConfirmation.text1: Your event has been successfully saved in our database. It will be published once approved by an administrator.
eventConfirmation.text2: Your event will be reviewed by an administrator within 24 hours and, once approved, will be visible on the map. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

contactPage.title: Contact with us!
contactPage.text1: If you have an interesting <1>idea</1> that could help improve our platform, reach out to us! <1>Experiencing issues</1> on the site? We’re here to help. Contact us, and we’ll do our best to resolve the problem as quickly as possible.

cooperationPage.title: Contact with us!
cooperationPage.text1: Would you like to <1>promote</1> your company or product on our platform? Or maybe you have an idea on how we can <1>develop</1> our site together and create new, innovative solutions? We are also open to <1>collaborating with patrons</1> who would like to support our activities and become part of our growth. Reach out to us, and let's discuss opportunities for collaboration!

rangeDisabledInfo: Applies to camps, matches or tournaments categories.

addPlace.title: Want to Make Your Mark on the Map?
addPlace.text1: Add your field, organize a tournament, offer your services, or create a football camp! Share a place that awaits athletes and teams from all around. Promote your offer,
addPlace.text2: get noticed, and attract new participants!

navigation.addPoint: Add a point on the map

hero.option1: Discover an interactive map that opens up a world of football opportunities for you!
hero.option2: Check what's happening in your area and join the game!

siteDescription.desc1: Here you will find all the important information about tournaments, six-a-side leagues, kids' football schools, fields for rent, and football-related services.
siteDescription.desc2: Check what's happening in your area and join the game!
siteDescription.title: Discover an interactive map that opens up a world of football opportunities!

users.desc1: Stay up to date with football events in your area and join local tournaments!
users.desc2: Easily find places where your kids can improve their skills under the guidance of professional coaches.
users.desc3: Rent a field for a game with friends or for training.

owners.desc1: Post announcements about your football events to attract more participants and spectators.
owners.desc2: Increase the use of your facilities by sharing information about available times on the map.
owners.desc3: Attract new students by adding details about your training offer and location.
